title: Sorting through NFL draft overreactions on Shedeur Sanders, Kirk Cousins and the Giants, Jags and Steelers
description: It's time to weigh in on the biggest overreactions of the weekend, from Shedeur Sanders' slide to QB moves for the Giants and Steelers.
author: Dan Graziano

title: Browns end Sanders' slide, pick QB in 5th round
description: The Browns traded up in the fifth round Saturday and selected quarterback Shedeur Sanders at No. 144 overall, ending the Colorado star's NFL draft free fall.
author: Daniel Oyefusi

title: 'No-one expected this' - how Slot took Liverpool to brink of title
description: As Liverpool stand on the brink of the Premier League title, BBC Sport explores the impact made by Arne Slot this season.

title: Eubank outpoints bitter rival Benn in emotional fight
description: Chris Eubank Jr narrowly beats bitter foe Conor Benn as one of Britain's most rancorous and long-running boxing rivalries lives up to the hype.

title: 2025 NFL draft: Buffalo Bills full draft class
description: A recap of all the selections the Buffalo Bills made in the 2025 NFL draft. They had nine picks in total, including six defensive players.

title: Detroit Lions undrafted free agent tracker 2025: Following every UDFA signing
description: The Detroit Lions are entering the next player acquisition phase, signing a batch of undrafted free agents to fill out their roster.

title: Eubank: I am a genuinely dangerous man. How will Benn deal with that?
description: Boxing is a game of bluff. Of move and counter-measure. Feints and fakes, distraction and deception. But beneath all of that, there remains the truth.

title: Eubank vs Benn: 'The first mega-fight with two bad guys'
description: Neither Chris Eubank Jr nor Conor Benn know how they will be received by the crowd when they fight at the Tottenham Hotspur stadium on Saturday night.
